location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Watson Henshaw, at Asseloo [Bandar-e Asaluyeh], to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Watson Henshaw, at Asseloo [Bandar-e Asaluyeh], to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, informing of his arrival at Asseloo from Bushire, and giving an account of his meeting with Shyhk Culfaun [Shaikh Khalfan], Governor of Asseloo, to negotiate for the recovery of the sulphur and mares and other cargo that were on board the wrecked Ahmed Shah.
